altTitles.ja: おやすみ ふみさん

description.en: Rinta, who moved to the city from the countryside and enrolled in a university in the heart of the city, meets “Fumi-san,” rumored to be the most beautiful girl on campus, in the literature club he joined. After attending a drinking party together, he ends up walking her home. He safely escorts her to her house and is about to head back when suddenly… Fumi-san transforms and forcefully invites him to her bed—!? “I wonder how long you can keep being a good person, Rinta-kun…?” Fumi-san pushes Rinta to his limits, testing his self-control until it shatters. Thus begins a forbidden university life filled with temptation.
Kwon Yong-jin, a protagonist who doesn’t believe in superstitions, experiences unbelievable events right after his 16th birthday.
description.pt-br: Kwon Yong-jin, um protagonista que não acredita em superstições, experiencia eventos inacreditáveis logo após seu 16º aniversário.

description.en:
Many heroes have fought through the eras. Soldiers play a sonorous melody, their traces shaping the course of history. Even now, their stories shall be read from a corner of the Pantheon. For those with regrets in their hearts, the battle begins. This is a tale of heroes who fell in space.  
  
I. White Wolf of Rainbows: There was once a man called the White Wolf of Solomon. A man who was even said to be the right hand man of Vice Admiral Dozle Zabi, the commander of the Principality of Zeon’s Space Assault Force. The year 0079 of the Universal Century was a year painted with death and destruction, all in the name of Zeon’s war for independence. So how did that man live through those times? This is the story that traces his paths…

altTitles.ja: 履いてください、鷹峰さん

description.en:
Takamine Takane is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president sits at the top of the social pyramid. And then there's Shirota Koushi, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects to speak of. One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san's naked breasts and finds out the secret behind her unbelievable success. From then on, his school life changes.

“Become my closet!”

Shirota is forced into underwear-putting-on servitude!?
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/please-put-them-on-takamine-san)
description.ja: 生徒会長の鷹峰さんはスクールカーストのトップ中のトップ、神！　対して、友達も存在感も皆無の白田くんはある日、鷹峰さんの生おっぱいを見てしまう。そこから変わるスクールライフ。――「私にパンツを履かせなさい」なんと鷹峰さんは”未だ穢れ知らぬ乙女（エターナル・バージンロード）”という能力でパンツを脱いで時をかける少女だった。ノーパンではいられない鷹峰さんのクローゼットとして白田くんは鷹峰さんにモモ色おねだりをされ続けるハメに…。
description.ru:
Президент студсовета, Такамине-сан находится на самом верху школьной иерархии. Она — практически бог!  
Однажды Широта-кун случайно увидел обнажённую грудь Такамине. С того момента его школьная жизнь изменилась.  
- "Надень мои трусики для меня"   
В итоге Широта-кун оказался в стеснительном положении из-за розовых пристрастий Такамине-сан.  
  


---

description.pt-br:
A presidente do conselho estudantil, Takamine-san, está no topo da hierarquia escolar, uma deusa! Um dia, Shirota-kun acidentalmente vê os seios nus de Takamine-san. A partir de então, sua vida escolar mudou, sendo chantageado para uma vida de servidão a Takamine-san. ― “Coloque minha calcinha para mim”
Shirota-kun acabou em uma situação difícil devido aos favores cor-de-rosa de Takamine-san.

description.ja: 悪の組織の女幹部セクシーフジヤマ（本名・藤山忍）。正義の魔法少女との戦いに負け続けた彼女は組織からの罰則金で金欠に陥っていた…。そんなある日、隣の部屋に憎っくき魔法少女プリンセス・マム（本名・真白まむ）が引っ越してきて…。

description.en:
♪'Lalala, the cute puppy will die in a while.'♪  
  
♪'And I feel that fella near waterfall will fall and drown, oh yes, he will.'♪  
  
A karaoke prophet wanders around the town singing weird prophecies into his trusty handy karaoke. No matter how you look at it he's a risky guy, but his sinister prophecies are always right. A puppy that high schooler Yori got from her boyfriend dies. Later, a middle-aged man drowns after falling into a waterfall, a giant fire occurs in the city, and… even more?! The scary, the grotesque, even the ridiculous: a collection of bizarre horror stories!

description.en: Kohinata Minoru is a college student at a college that is popular for its sports rather than academic orientation. He starts out as a gymnast alongside his friend, Nana, but is bullied by his gymnast seniors. One evening, a karate student at the college, Mutou Ryuuji, witnesses Minoru being bullied and comes to his rescue and drags him into the world of karate. Minoru makes new friends and learns some of their dark pasts, including a shocking death that reveals motives for revenge. (from Baka-Updates)

How will the optimistic self proclaimed genius handle the life he will lead from now on? As well as handle the new acquaintances and enemies it brings with it. Let the story of action, life, romance and stupidity begin. (Original Web [Novel](https://www.fictionpress.com/s/3068594/1/Soul-Anomaly)).

description.en: By the will of the goddess, Itsuki Shinomiya was given the privilege of choosing various abilities and being reborn in another world. However, before going to the other world, he didn't want to involve himself in scary, dirty, gross things like battles. Fiercely determined to live a slow life, he chose the unique skill [Pocket Money], giving him an amount of money once per day. "With this, I can hang out with girls without having to work!" Dreaming of avoiding battles and living with cute girls, Itsuki stepped into the other world! But the reality was not that simple. Getting attacked by giant bugs, getting caught up in arguments at the guild, and getting stuck with slaves?! In the end, will Itsuki be able to live his ideal slow life?! Using unique skills and manufacturing skills, an exciting other-world slow life with beautiful girls starts now! (hopefully)
description.ja:
異世界での第二の人生は…とにかく楽したい!!

忍宮一樹――心も身体もすり減らして働くサラリーマンは、夢のスローライフを目指して異世界へと降り立った。だが、夢の実現のための切り札、一日一回お金を生み出せる『お小遣い』スキルでは全く足りず、やむなく働くハメに。なんとか“錬金術師ギルド”に就職し、スローライフの第一歩…と思いきや、営業先の“冒険者ギルド”では難癖をつけられてしまう。さらには美女から「あなたの奴隷になる」と宣言され大混乱！ どうなる俺の異世界ライフ!?
description.pt-br: Pela vontade da deusa, Itsuki Shinomiya recebeu o privilégio de escolher várias habilidades e renascer em outro mundo. No entanto, antes de ir para o outro mundo, ele não queria se envolver em coisas assustadoras, sujas e grosseiras como batalhas. Ferozmente determinado a viver uma vida lenta, ele escolheu a habilidade única [Pocket Money], dando a ele uma quantia em dinheiro uma vez por dia. “Com isso, posso sair com as garotas sem precisar trabalhar!”. Sonhando em evitar batalhas e viver com lindas garotas, Itsuki entrou no outro mundo! Mas a realidade não era tão simples. Ser atacado por insetos gigantes, se envolver em discussões na guilda e ficar preso a escravos? No final, Itsuki será capaz de viver sua vida lenta ideal? Usando habilidades únicas e habilidades de fabricação, uma emocionante vida lenta de outro mundo com lindas garotas começa agora.

description.en:
Bedridden and abandoned, Takuto Ira spent his days in the hospital trying to beat the illness that was slowly killing him. His only solace lay in the nation management strategy game Eternal Nations, where he had built a reputation as the greatest player to ever live. 

After succumbing to his disease, Takuto awoke within the game next to Atou — the Hero unit for his favorite civilization, Mynoghra. Now they’ll set out to conquer the world together (again), one unit, settlement, and level at a time!
description.pl: Ira Takuto umiera w młodym wieku i budzi się w świecie przypominającym jego ulubioną grę 『Eternal Nations』 w której spotyka postać z gry, Atou. Razem postanawiają stworzyć własne królestwo.
description.pt-br: Eu reencarnei como um deus do mal. Ira Takuto sucumbiu à doença em tenra idade e acabou reencarnando em um mundo que lembrava o jogo de simulação de estratégia, “Eternal Nations”, do qual ele adorava jogar quando estava vivo. O que apareceu na frente dele foi Atou, uma garota pertencente à civilização do mal que eu costumava interpretar como “Mynoghra”. Os dois decidiram criar um novo país neste mundo mais uma vez.

description.en:
Chae Yu-ra is an ordinary girl who likes to watch online game broadcasts. She becomes the sole sponsor of an unknown streamer, Choi Ji-hyuk, who plays a virtual reality game called Constellation. But one day, she wakes up inside the game and discovers that she is Choi Ji-hyuk's constellation, which means she can grant him wishes and powers.

Choi Ji-hyuk, on the other hand, is an elite hunter who is determined to take revenge on the constellation that abandoned him in the past. He is unaware that his constellation is actually Chae Yu-ra, the girl he despises for her lack of skill at the game. How will they relate to each other in this dangerous world full of mysteries?
description.es-la:
El único error que he cometido hasta ahora es ver una transmisión sin espectadores de un juego online.
Mi único crimen fue patrocinar a alguien duramente.
ㅤ
Pero ahora lo entiendo.
¡Hacerme pasar por esta terrible experiencia es demasiado duro!
ㅤ
"¡No podemos perder más tiempo"
"¡Espera un minuto, déjame comprar esta armadura"
ㅤ
"¿Qué es esto?"
Me pregunté mientras veía esa transmisión antes de que eso pasara.

___________________________________________________
ㅤ
Choi Ji-hyuk miró fijamente el artículo que venía como recompensa de una Mazmorra de Clase S.
Era un objeto obtenido que había arrebatado a los otros Cazadores que intentaban obtenerllo.
ㅤ
"No importa cuanto impida este objeto la destrucción del mundo"
"No importa si es un objeto por el que arriesgué mi vida"
"Incluso si muero, seré miserable, por eso, si es he de morir, al menos quiero ver la cara de esa maldita Constelación"
ㅤ
Pero, ¿quién hubiera pensado que esa Constelación era una chica que parecía tener poco más de 20 años?
ㅤ
"Chae Yu-ra"
ㅤ
Él lo lamentó por ella, quien había vivido una vida normal y pacífica toda su vida, desafortunadamente, nunca tuvo la intención de abandonar a su Constelación.
ㅤ
"Dime que soy lo más importante para ti"
ㅤ
Al menos así será hasta que llegue el fin del mundo
ㅤ
"Dímelo"

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: できそこないの姫君たち
でき姫

description.en: Fujishiro Nanaki is super cute, super popular, and super annoyed with anyone as plain as her classmate Kurokawa Kanade. When Nanaki finds out her boyfriend’s cheating on her, however, her life makes a complete 180—as does her relationship with Kanade. This all-new yuri manga series explores the budding romance between the cool girl in school and the “plain” girl she once brushed off!
description.pt-br: Nanaki-chan é a popular da escola, ela exalta sua beleza com a maior auto-estima e arrogância possível, ela é a princesinha fútil e imatura que acha que a aparência é fundamental. Mas um dia tudo isso vai por terra quando ela leva um pé na bunda gostosim do cara mais bonito e popular da escola. E pra piorar além de ser esculachada pelo zé bundão, tudo isso aconteceu na frente da mina que ela até então tirava uma onda por não ser tão vaidosa como ela… Só que dessa "tragédia" ela vai perceber que beleza nem sempre é tudo…

altTitles.ja: トライガンマキシマム

description.en:
Vash the Stampede rises again! It's been two years since the mysterious and super-nice gunman went into hiding, and the people of his desert planet are suffering. It takes a friend in peril to bring him out, and when he does, his enemies come chasing… as well as those crazy insurance girls, Millie and Meryl. And Wolfwood the wandering priest? Well, that's who found him in the first place! The gang's all back, and the trouble is coming in Trigun Maximum.

Notes:
 - Nightow changed publishers to Shonen Gahosha and the series continued to be serialized in Young King Ours magazine. Due to the original publisher retaining the name Trigun, Nightow had to change the title to Trigun Maximum, which isn´t a sequel but a new name for the rest of the series. 
- The first 3 volumes were published under the title 'Trigun' and the entire series compiled into 14 books as 'Trigun Maximum' (the numbering was also restarted when the title changed).
 - Won the Seiun Award at the 48th Japan Science Fiction Conventionwere for the best comic of the year.

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

description.en:
It is common knowledge that it is best to become an adventurer when you are as young as possible, because the magical power that is the basis of an adventurer's strength will hardly grow if you don't train it while you are young. But this man, Rick Gladiator, who became an adventurer when he was over thirty years old, had the combat power of an S-rank adventurer, the highest rank in the world. In fact, Rick has lived an unimaginable life with the members of the legendary Orihalcon Fist, a party of the continent's strongest adventurers. From dragons to vampires, Rick's fighting prowess, trained by his literally "monster" mentors, allows him to defeat elite adventurers one after another who try to underestimate him.
___
**Character Designer:** [Tea](https://mangadex.org/author/71d4c549-2476-4803-a9c2-c48a15cc0fd4)
description.ja: 漫画を担当するのは、週刊少年ジャンプにて「レディ・ジャスティス」を連載していた、荻野ケン！ド迫力のバトルアクションと、怒涛のギャグ！　魂のこもったキャラが縦横無尽に活躍する漫画版をお楽しみください！！　『冒険者になるのはできるだけ若いうちがいい』しかしその男、なんと30歳を過ぎてから冒険者を目指したリック・グラディアートルは、新米ながら最高位[Ｓランク]並みの戦闘力を有していた。　伝説のパーティ「オリハルコン・フィスト」──ドラゴンからヴァンパイアまで、文字通り「モンスター」級の師匠たちに鍛え上げられた戦闘力でなめてかかってくるエリート冒険者を次々にねじ伏せていく。「出遅れ…？何歳から冒険者やったって何歳から新しいこと始めたって…いいだろ！」
description.vi:
Rick Gladiator - Làm lễ tân ở Guild suốt 14 năm nhưng vẫn ấp ủ giấc mơ được trở thành Mạo Hiểm Giả. Và ở tuổi 30, anh đã nghỉ việc để theo đuổi con đường đó.
Với người luống tuổi và khởi đầu muộn như Rick, sẽ quá là khó khăn cho anh. Nhưng rồi anh có được cuộc gặp gỡ định mệnh và được huấn luyện bởi Hội Nhóm Mạo Hiểm Giả mạnh nhất Lục Địa - Cường Quyền Orihalcon.
description.pt-br: É de conhecimento geral que é melhor se tornar um aventureiro quando você é o mais jovem possível, porque o poder mágico que é a base da força de um aventureiro dificilmente crescerá se você não o treinar enquanto é jovem. Mas esse homem, Rick Gladiator, que se tornou um aventureiro quando tinha mais de trinta anos, tinha o poder de combate de um aventureiro de classificação S, a classificação mais alta do mundo. Na verdade, Rick viveu uma vida inimaginável com os membros do lendário Orihalcon Fist, um grupo dos aventureiros mais fortes do continente. De dragões a vampiros, a destreza de luta de Rick, treinada por seus mentores literalmente "monstros", permite que ele derrote aventureiros de elite um após o outro que tentam subestimá-lo.

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

description.en: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
description.es-la: Ha pasado un año desde el regreso de Kirito y Asuna del Underworld. Con ellos está Alice, que ha recibido un cuerpo físico. Pero su paz se rompe rápidamente cuando los tres se ven empujados de repente a un juego desconocido, Unital Ring. Este nuevo mundo es un MMO de supervivencia que fusiona todos los VRMMO creados con el programa "The Seed". Nada más empezar, Kirito se encuentra sin nada más que su ropa interior. Ahora, ¡Tiene que desafiar a un misterioso VRMMOSVG en circunstancias desesperadas!

description.en:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...
description.id: Setelah dikalahkan dan ditangkap, Dragon Slayer Leon menjadi tawanan Silver Dragon Queen. Dengan kesadaran akan kematian, dia menggunakan sihir terlarang untuk mengutuk sang ratu, tetapi secara tak terduga, sang ratu kehilangan kendali. Dia berpikir bahwa ini akan membuat sang ratu hidup dalam rasa malu seumur hidupnya, dan itu akan sepadan dengan misinya sebagai pemburu naga. Namun, dua tahun kemudian, ketika Leon membuka matanya, di sampingnya ada seorang gadis kecil naga dengan ekor...
description.uk:
Після поразки та полону, вбивця драконів Леон потрапив у полон до королеви клану Срібних Драконів. Усвідомлюючи наближення смерті, він використав заборонену техніку, щоб накласти прокляття на королеву, але несподівано королева втратила контроль.

Він думав, що це змусить королеву жити з соромом до кінця життя, і це буде гідно титулу вбивці драконів.

Але через два роки, коли Леон розплющив очі, поруч з ним сиділа дівчинка-дракон із хвостиком...

description.bg: Тайното село Коноха. Проблемният възпитаник на Нинджа академията Наруто и днес не спира с белите! Огромната мечта на същия този Наруто е да приеме званието на историческия герой Хокаге и да стане нинджа, като надмине всички предишни Хокаге. Ала около раждането на Наруто изглежда витае една тайна...!?
description.cs: Stát se nejlepším nindžou na světě není věc snadná, dokonce ani když nejste obecně zatracovaný outsider, který má v sobě zapečetěného devítiocasého démona, jenž kdysi málem srovnal se zemí celou nindžovskou vesnici. Naruto je však pevně odhodlaný splnit si tento sen a vzdát se za žádných okolností nehodlá. Nejspíš proto, že neví, co to slovo znamená (a prakticky určitě ho nedokáže správně napsat).
description.de: Naruto ist ein berüchtigter Tunichtgut in seinem Dorf, das fast ausschließlich aus Ninja besteht. Er liebt Nudelsuppe und spielt anderen gern Streiche. So ist es kein Wunder, dass er nicht gerade beliebt ist. Doch gerade deshalb will er der beste Ninja seines Dorfes werden. Zu diesem Zweck gehen er und seine Mitschüler Sasuke und Sakura beim großen Meister Kakashi in die Lehre...
description.en:
Before Naruto's birth, a great demon fox had attacked the Hidden Leaf Village. The 4th Hokage from the leaf village sealed the demon inside the newly born Naruto, causing him to unknowingly grow up detested by his fellow villagers. Despite his lack of talent in many areas of ninjutsu, Naruto strives for only one goal: to gain the title of Hokage, the strongest ninja in his village. Desiring the respect he never received, Naruto works toward his dream with fellow friends Sasuke and Sakura and mentor Kakashi as they go through many trials and battles that come with being a ninja.  


---
description.es:
En la Villa Oculta de la Hoja, un chaval de lo más problemático que estudia en la escuela de ninjas, Naruto, se dedica a urdir gamberrada tras gamberrada. El sueño de Naruto es el de llegar un día a heredar el nombre de Hokage, reservado a los grandes héroes, y de convertirse en el mejor ninja de todos los tiempos. ¿¡Podrá Naruto llegar a cumplir sus anhelos de grandeza...!?

---
La aldea escondida entre las hojas está habitada principalmente por ninjas, y entre ellos uno se destaca por sobre todos los demás por ser el más desobediente y quilombero: ¡¡Naruto Uzumaki!! El sueño de Naruto es convertirse en el hokage, el líder de los ninjas, y que todos reconozcan su fuerza; pero el secreto de su verdadero origen puede que sea demasiado difícil de superar.
description.fi:
Konohan ninjakylässä ilman vanhempia varttunut Naruto Uzumaki on ninjakoulun heikoimpia oppilaita. Mutta Narutossa piilee voimia, jotka ylittävät inhimilliset rajat... Naruto on vauhdikas seikkailutarina ninjanuorukaisesta ja hänen ystävistään, taisteluista, toveruudesta ja kunniasta. Sekä kotimaassaan että ulkomailla huippusuosittu sarja pohjautuu taruihin Japanin historian mystisistä ninjasotureista. 

Sarjakuva etenee takakannesta etukanteen ja oikealta vasemmalle. Suositellaan yli 12-vuotiaille.
description.fr: Naruto est un garçon un peu spécial. Il est toujours tout seul et son caractère fougueux ne l'aide pas vraiment à se faire apprécier dans son village. Malgré cela, il garde au fond de lui une ambition: celle de devenir un maître Hokage, la plus haute distinction dans l'ordre des ninjas, et ainsi obtenir la reconnaissance de ses pairs.
description.id: Ini adalah Desa Konohagakure... Naruto adalah salah satu murid di Akademi Ninja yang suka berbuat onar!! Impian Naruto adalah menjadi seorang Hokage. Tetapi, Naruto memiliki rahasia sejak lahir karena di dalam tubuhnya terdapat siluman rubah yang disegel! Inilah petualangan Naruto untuk mewujudkan impiannya...
description.it:
"Naruto" è incentrato sulle avventure di un ragazzino, Uzumaki Naruto, che vuole diventare un famoso ninja e lasciare un segno nella storia. Gli ostacoli sul suo cammino sono però molti, come le prove che dovrà sostenere e i rivali che dovrà affrontare...

---
Naruto Uzumaki è un ragazzo dodicenne del Villaggio della Foglia che insegue il sogno di diventare Hokage, cioè il ninja più forte, nonché capo del villaggio. Il giovane custodisce in sé un segreto di cui lui stesso è all'oscuro: all'interno del suo corpo è sigillato un demone, conosciuto come Volpe a Nove Code, che attaccò il villaggio dodici anni prima e fu sigillato dal Quarto Hokage in cambio della vita. Per questo motivo, Naruto è stato sempre associato allo spirito demoniaco ed è cresciuto isolato da tutti. Dopo l'ennesima bocciatura di Naruto all'esame dell'accademia per il diploma di Genin, il suo maestro Iruka Umino lo salva dal maestro traditore Mizuki che lo aveva spinto a rubare un rotolo contenente delle tecniche proibite. In questo frangente, Naruto scopre finalmente il suo segreto. Questo, unito al desiderio di salvare Iruka, gli dà la spinta necessaria a sconfiggere Mizuki con la Tecnica Superiore della Moltiplicazione del Corpo, appresa dal rotolo. Grazie a questa dimostrazione di coraggio, il ragazzo riesce a guadagnarsi la promozione a Genin ed entra a far parte della Squadra 7 insieme a Sakura Haruno e Sasuke Uchiha, sotto la guida del maestro Kakashi Hatake.
description.ja: ここは木ノ葉隠れの里。忍術学校の問題児、ナルトは今日もイタズラ三昧！！　そんなナルトのでっかい夢は歴代の勇者、火影の名を受けついで、先代を越える忍者になることだ。だがナルトには出生の秘密が…！？
description.pl: Osada Konoha-gakure. Naruto, uczeń szkoły dla ninja, rozrabia jak tylko potrafi! Mimo to, jego marzeniem jest pokonanie "Hokage", czyli aktualnego przywódcy wojowników. Gdy Naruto się rodził, wydarzyło się coś, o czym on sam wciąż jeszcze nie wie...
description.pt: La aldea escondida entre las hojas está habitada principalmente por ninjas, y entre ellos uno se destaca por sobre todos los demás por ser el más desobediente y quilombero: ¡¡Naruto Uzumaki!! El sueño de Naruto es convertirse en el hokage, el líder de los ninjas, y que todos reconozcan su fuerza; pero el secreto de su verdadero origen puede que sea demasiado difícil de superar.
description.ru: Двенадцать лет назад, мощный Девятихвостый Демон-Лис напал на деревню ниндзя, Коноху. Демон был быстро побежден и запечатан в младенце по имени Наруто Узумаки. Но для этого, главному ниндзя Конохи, четвёртому хокаге пришлось пожертвовать жизнью… Теперь, по прошествии 12-и лет, Наруто является номером один среди придурков ниндзя, который полон решимости стать следующим Хокаге и получить признание всех, кто когда-либо сомневался в нем!
description.sr: Jedan od najpopularnijih naslova širom sveta sada je konačno dostupan i domaćim čitaocima. Serijal prati avanture dečaka Naruta, koji pokušava da postane veliki ratnik i nadmaši sve prethodnike. Ali moraće najpre da se bori sa samim sobom.
description.tr:
Naruto, ünlü mangaka Masaşi Kişimoto tarafından yaratılan, 1999 yılından beri Japonya’da yayınlanan dünyaca ünlü manga serisi artık Türkiye’de.

Bugüne kadar Japonya’da 100 milyondan fazla satan Naruto serisi, 2002 yılında bu başarısı taçlandırarak animeye uyarlandı. Ülkemizde de gösterilen bu anime, manga kültürünü dünyaya tanıtıp; Naruto’yu dünyadaki en önemli mangalardan biri haline getirdi. Yıllardan beri geniş bir hayran kitlesi tarafından Türkçe’de yayınlanması beklenen bu eser, manganın özünden hiçbir şey kaybetmemesine özen gösterilerek ve Japonya’da olduğu gibi sağdan sola okunacak biçimde hazırlandı. Yediden yetmişe herkese hitap eden Naruto, çizgi roman kültürü ile ilgili olmayanların bile severek okuyabileceği bir eser.
description.uk: Дванадцять років тому, потужний Дев'ятихвостий Демон-Лис напав на селище Коноху. Демон був швидко переможений і запечатаний в дитинку на ім'я Наруто Узумакі. Але для цього, головному ніндзя Конохи, четвертому хокаге довелося пожертвувати життям... Тепер, після 12-и років, Наруто є номером один серед ніндзя, який сповнений рішучості стати наступним Хокаґе та отримати визнання всіх, хто коли-небудь сумнівався в ньому!

title.en: There Are No Bad Precious Children

altTitles.en: There is No Such Thing as a Bad Golden Child in The World

description.en:
<You have obtained the skill [Precious Child Status Notification]! You can now more accurately assess the condition of the child who needs your help.>

Edith Irene Bruxelles had one secret: she had experienced possession.

One day, out of nowhere, she became Edith. Not only that, she was in a completely different era, in a strange country she had never heard of before!

And, on top of that, she had an unusual ability that others couldn't see.

To return to her original life, Edith chose to enter into a contractual marriage with a genius sorcerer Duke.

"Will you marry me?"
"Yes! I’d love to!"

However...

"What’s going on? Do you really think you’re the Duchess of the Duke’s family?"
"Bruxelles? Has anyone even heard of that family?"

The nobles reject her because she comes from a fallen family.

"Actually, this is great!"

She thinks positively and goes about her life, but she keeps running into children who are struggling behind the social scenes.

<Stress: 130/100 [Danger!!]>
[Appropriate action for the Precious Child is required.]

"Miss, could you please hold the child's hand?"

Unable to watch any longer, she steps in, and before she knows it, she becomes known as the "fixer."

"Duchess, I was hoping we could meet privately next week."
"I’d like that too. Would you be able to come to our residence?"

The story of how I, once an outcast in high society, became the top invitee.

Finally adjusting to the changed atmosphere, now her husband is acting strangely.

"Is that something you normally say you like?"
"Well, I guess so?"
"If that's the case, then what I like is you."

Oh my, who in the world confesses like that!?

(Source: Kakao Page, edited)

description.en:
It is 1880 at the all-boys school, Lacombrade Academy in France. Serge Battour is a cheerful and kind new student who is trying to fit in with the rest of the student body, despite the taboo of his gypsy heritage, made obvious by his dark skin. However, his roommate Gilbert Cocteau, known for sleeping with anyone at the school to manipulate them to his advantage, is not helping the situation, especially when he makes it his personal goal to bring about Serge's downfall.   
  
Originally published in the 1970's, Kaze to Ki no Uta is considered by many to be the first true yaoi manga. In 1979, this series was awarded the prestigious Shogakukan Manga Award for shounen/shoujo manga.  
  
A bit of warning: "Kaze…" includes scenes of rape and child abuse (including lots of shota).

description.en: Shiiba Gaku wants to be the boss of Kushima High, which is popularly known as “Windmill”. In order to become number one, he has to face many challenges because the school is full of tough opponents. Just as he decides to take the fist step, an afro-looking guy interrupts him. What will happen from now on? Will he be able to realize his dream?

description.en:
Haro Ogawa, a high school student, is also a self-taught oil painter who is trying to paint the ultimate nude. 
After an unexpected encounter with an elusive "witch", he sets his sights on applying to art school... 
The mystery that resides in the human body, the ultimate "beauty", will be painted on canvas! 
A skin-colored coming-of-age drama!
description.ja: 「俺もいつかこんなヌードを描きたい――」　幼少時に見た絵画、「魔女のヌード」に魅入られた高校生・小川波路（おがわはろ）。日々、独学でヌードを描く彼の前に現れたのは、「魔女のヌード」に描かれた女性に瓜二つの美女、神生伶だった。ハロは思わず、伶にヌードモデルになってほしいと頼みこむが…!?　目指すはヌードで藝大合格!!

He comes across her alone on the rooftop after school, exposing her erotic body in an extreme swimsuit! Kyousuke finds out Itsuha's secret, which is too unexpected to be ……!

description.en:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.
___
**Alt Official English:** [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/), [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/e_R0002)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ داستان جایی شروع میشه که خدایان بحث این رو به میان میاورند که انسان‌ها زنده بمانند یا نابود شوند. ولی یک والکری به تنهایی بحث را به سمتی میکشاند که به انسان‌ها اجازه یک مبارزه در مقابل خدایان داده شود. و به این شکل کور سوی امید بشریت روشن باقی میماند. سیزده خدا، سیزده انسان، در مقابل هم قرار میگیرند تا سرنوشت بشریت را مشخص کنند
description.fr: Tous les mille ans, l'ensemble des dieux, tous panthéons réunis, se réunissent au Valhalla, le paradis des âmes, lors d'une assemblée présidée par Zeus, le dieu suprême grec, afin de décider du sort des humains. Or, cette année-là, il est décidé à la quasi-unanimité de détruire l'humanité. Mais la Valkyrie Brunehilde interrompt la conférence et propose aux dieux de se mesurer aux mortels lors du tournoi de Ragnarök, pour déterminer s'ils valent vraiment la peine d'êtres anéantis. Ce tournoi opposera 13 dieux issus de diverses mythologies à 13 puissants humains qui ont fait l'histoire. Si l'humanité remporte au moins sept des 13 duels, alors les dieux épargneront l'humanité.
description.id: - In Indonesian by [Akasha](http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/akasha-record-of-ragnarok-01) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.it: - In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/record-of-ragnarok) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.ru: История начинается c собрания богов, на котором они решают судьбу человечества: убить всех или оставить в живых, согласившись в никчёмности рода людского, боги выбирают первое... Но одна валькирия выдвигает предложение: позволить богам и человечеству сразиться в битве, в качестве последнего луча надежды людей. 13 богов сразятся против 13 чемпионов людей в битвах один на один, чтобы решить, будет ли человечество жить или сгинет в могуществе божественной силы.
description.tr: Hikâye, tanrıların insanlığın yaşamasına ya da ölmesine karar vermek için bir toplantı düzenlemesi ve insanlığı yok etmeye karar vermesiyle başlar. Ancak yalnız bir Valkyrie, insanlığın hayatta kalması için son bir umut olarak tanrıların ve insanlığın son bir savaşa girmesine izin verilmesi önerisini ortaya atar. 13 tanrı, insanlığın yaşayıp yaşamayacağına karar vermek için teke tek savaşlarda 13 insan şampiyona karşı dövüşecektir.
description.uk: Історія починається зі зборів богів, на яких вирішується доля людства: життя чи смерть. Погодившись з нікчемністю людського роду, боги вибирають друге... Але одна валькірія висуває пропозицію: дозволити богам і людям битися в битві, яка стане останнім променем надії для людства. 13 богів б'ються проти 13 людських чемпіонів у битвах віч-на-віч, щоб вирішити, чи буде людство жити чи згине у могутності божественної сили.
description.es-la: Los Dioses se reúnen con el objetivo de decidir si la humanidad debe vivir o morir. Y aunque llegan a la conclusión de que debe perecer, una Valkyria propone que una lucha de dioses contra humanos para tomar tan difícil decisión. Así, 13 humanos pelearán contra 13 Dioses para resolver el destino de la humanidad.
description.pt-br: A cada 1.000 anos, as divindades se reúnem sob o conselho de Valhalla para decidir sobre o direito da humanidade de continuar vivendo, ou por sua destruição, porém desta vez os deuses estão furiosos com o descaso humano para com o planeta, pendendo passim para aniquilar toda a raça humana, porém uma única valquíria os convencem de realizar o Ragnarok, uma batalha mortal entre humanos e deuses para decidir sob sua sobrevivência, 13 humanos enfrentarão 13 deuses. Serão este humanos capazes de colidir com as poderosas divindades?

title.en: I Became the Mother of the Evil Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Became the Mother of the Tragic Male Lead
I Became the Mother of the Bloody Male Lead
I Became the Mother of a Bloody Male Lead
I Became the Bloodthirsty Male Lead's Mother

altTitles.fr: Je suis la mère du anti-héros

altTitles.pt-br: Eu me tornei a mãe do protagonista louco

altTitles.es: Reencarne cómo la madre del protagonista masculino loco obsesionado

altTitles.es-la: Me convertí en la madre del protagonista masculino que era un producto de desecho

altTitles.th: ฉันกลายเป็นแม่พระเอกนิยายจอมเสเพล

altTitles.ja: 闇堕ち主人公のママになりました

altTitles.zh: 成为颓废文男主的妈妈

description.en: The newly reincarnated Sheriel learns she has become the mother of Karthizel Roperam, the male lead of a dark romance fantasy novel. All the neglect Karthizel faces as a child leads him to become a crazy and obsessive man who’s willing to kill anyone to get what he wants, even his own mother! Then the only way for Sheriel to keep herself alive in this timeline is to have him be raised right under loving parents, which means she’ll also need to make amends with her cold, estranged husband. Will Sheriel be able to save herself and this broken family?

title.en: The Mercenary Bomber Explodes All Cheaters

altTitles.ja: 爆弾魔な傭兵、同時召喚された最強チート共を片っ端から消し飛ばす

altTitles.ja-ro: Bakudanma na Youhei, Douji Shoukan sareta Saikyou Cheat-domo wo Katappashi kara Keshitobasu

description.en:
Jack Aaron is the strongest mercenary known by the nickname “The Bomber.” After completing a heavy mission, what awaited him was a summons to another world!

In this summoning, everyone is granted a special ability. However, the ability Jack was given was quite limited: [Bomb Making]. The people who summoned him from the other world dismissed Jack’s ability as useless, and the other summoned individuals began to mock him as a useless foreigner.

To return to his original world, he forms a partnership with Alice, an alchemist derisively called "The Witch." During this process, Jack learns that the other summoned individuals, who he thought he had killed in an explosion, are still alive.

In order to return to his original world, and to hunt down the surviving summoned individuals, Jack and Alice’s worst journey is about to begin...!
description.ja:
『爆弾魔』の異名をもつ最強の傭兵、ジャック・アーロン。ヘビーな任務を終えた彼を待っていたのは異世界召喚だった。

召喚にあたり、誰もが特殊な能力を与えられるのだがジャックに付与されたのは「確実に作動する爆弾が作れる」という限定的な能力だった。彼を喚び出した異世界人たちはジャックの能力を無能と決めつけ、他の転移者たちも無能な外国人としてジャックを笑いはじめる。

彼が元の世界でどんな男だったかも知らずに…。

手始めに「国を破壊する爆弾」を作り出し、あっという間に国家を転覆させてしまうジャック。

元の世界へ戻るため『魔女』と揶揄される錬金術師のアリスと協力関係を結ぶのだが、その過程で爆殺したと思った他の転移者たちが生き残っている事を知る。

“俺を舐めたままでいられると思うな”

元の世界へ戻るため、そして生き残った転移者たちを狩り尽くすためジャックとアリスの最悪の旅が今、始まる…！

「小説家になろう」発！舐めてた男が爆弾魔だった系ダークファンタジーをご覧あれ！

title.en: So I Am the Ancestor of the Demonic Path?

altTitles.zh-ro: Yuanlai Wo Shi Modao Lao Zu?

altTitles.en: It Turns Out That I'm the Demonic Ancestor!
So I Am the Ancestor of the Devil?

description.en: The almighty Yun-Ye is now reaching the end of his life. As the eight factions that have claimed to be righteous knew about the end of Yun-Ye's life, they launched an attack against him. At the same time, a person with the same name has traversed and took over the body along with a system, and he has now started the path to eliminate evil and spread righteousness. Yun-Ye is able to earn points by completing system missions, then use them to trade for vitality. He will then slowly lead his six disciples and take back the treasure and legacies that belonged to them, and slowly expose the dark side of the eight factions.

title.en: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

altTitles.fr: Ma maison est une zone de convergence magique: Uniquement en vivant là je suis le plus fort du monde

altTitles.ru: Мой дом — это место волшебной силы

altTitles.ja: 俺の家が魔力スポットだった件 ～住んでいるだけで世界最強～

altTitles.zh-hk: 原来我家是魔力点~只是住在那里就变成世界最强~

altTitles.ko: 우리 집이 마력스팟이었던 건에 대하여 ~살고 있는 것만으로 세계최강~

altTitles.pt-br: Minha casa está em um ponto mágico de poder, por morar lá eu me tornei o mais forte do mundo

altTitles.en: My House is a Magic Power Spot: Just by Living there I Become the Strongest in the World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

description.en: Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!
description.ja: 自宅でのんびりすることが、最強への近道だった――。強力な魔力スポットの上に建つ一軒家に住んでいた普通の青年ダイチ。 ある日、それを狙うやつらに家ごと異世界に召喚されてしまう!!　だが、長年魔力スポットに住み続け、魔力が貯めこまれたダイチは敵を一蹴！　さらにかわいい我が家の精霊サクラも現れて至れり尽くせり！　最強の魔力を持ったダイチが望むものはただ一つ――それは自宅で平穏に暮らすこと！
description.ru:
Жить беззаботно в своём доме — это, несомненно, великолепно. Но мой дом — самое большое в мире место волшебной силы. Каким-то образом вышло так, что меня с моим домом перенесло в другой мир. Выяснилось, что меня призвали какие-то парни, которые хотели присвоить магию моего дома себе. Тем не менее, я живу в этом месте в течение многих лет, и мое тело, по-видимому, аномально переполнено магией. Из-за каких-то непредвиденных обстоятельств те ребята, которые меня вызвали, быстро убежали. Как бы то ни было, все ещё есть невоспитанные люди, которые жаждут магии, просачивающейся из моего дома. Я не отдам свой дом никому! Я буду использовать свою силу, как захочу!   

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5915da/) (Raw)
description.es-la: Vivir sin preocupaciones en casa es el mejor atajo: mi casa es el mayor punto de poder mágico del mundo. Siendo ese el caso, tanto mi casa como yo fuimos invocados a otro mundo. Sin embargo, he estado viviendo en este lugar durante muchos años y aparentemente mi cuerpo está desbordado magia. Debido a circunstancias imprevistas por parte de los tipos que me invocaron, huyeron rápidamente. Como sea, todavía hay algunas personas mal educadas que codician la magia que escapa de mi casa. ¡No voy a ceder mi casa a esas personas! ¡Voy a ejercer mi poder como me plazca!
description.pt-br: Viver despreocupado em casa é a melhor coisa... minha casa é o maior ponto de força mágica do mundo. Sendo esse o caso, tanto minha casa quanto eu fomos convocados para outro mundo por algumas pessoas que estavam visado isso. No entanto, eu moro neste lugar há muitos anos e meu corpo está, aparentemente, transbordando de forma anormal com a magia. Devido a algumas circunstâncias imprevistas por aquelas pessoas que me chamaram, elas rapidamente fugiram. Seja como for, ainda há algumas pessoas mal-educadas que cobiçam a magia que vaza da minha casa. Eu não vou desistir da minha casa para essas pessoas! Vou usar meu poder como quiser!

altTitles.ja: 黒の召喚士
The Berserker Rises to Greatness.

description.en:
"If you truly want to get stronger, you have to challenge and defeat those stronger than yourself."

While being transmigrated to another world, Kelvin bartered away his memories for a collection of powerful new abilities. Setting out on the ultimate adventure as the world’s strongest Summoner — with his first Follower being the very goddess who brought him over! — he soon discovers his true nature as a battle junkie. Someone wants to pick a fight? Sure, bring it on!

Facing off against one formidable foe after another, Kelvin can hardly contain his delight as he revels in the absolute exhilaration of a good fight! The curtain rises on the start of an epic saga as this black-clad warrior and his allies carve their way into the annals of history! 
___
**Character Designer:** [Kurogin (DIGS)](https://mangadex.org/author/ad469135-32c7-4fcc-b490-d0ebc07eea16)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Official Raw Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1222ci/)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/black-summoner)
description.ru: Он очнулся в мире ничего не помня о себе, даже имени. Зато это мир меча и магии, а он призыватель. Ну, вперед, осваиваться в новом мире!
description.pt-br: As cortinas dessa história se abrem quando nosso protagonista troca suas memórias por um poder imensurável em um novo mundo. Agora, com o nome de Kelvin, ele precisa evoluir, dominar novos subordinados e se tornar o maior invocador de todos os tempos. Mas e então, até onde essa jornada vai nos levar?

altTitles.ja: たっちゃん、どっちとる？

description.en:
Let's be close friends together, the three of us ♡.

Tatsuya—nicknamed “Tacchan”—is a college student who ends up freeloading at the home of his twin childhood friends, Ritsuka and Futaba. The three of them were close friends, but the twins grew up to be cute, and their feelings of love for Tacchan seem like they're about to run wild!?

A slightly lewd and heart-pounding cohabitation romantic comedy ♡.
description.ja:
***3人でいっぱい『なかよし』しよ♡***

大学生の『たっちゃん』こと瀬戸竜哉は、幼なじみの双子『立花』と『双葉』の家に同居することになる。
『仲良し』だった3人だが、可愛く成長した双子の『たっちゃん』への恋心は暴走気味で――。
ちょっとえっちなときめき同居ラブコメディ♡


---

- [公式 Web](https://comiccune.jp/series/tatchan)
description.es-la:
Seamos "amigos" los tres ♡

Tatsuya, alias "Tatchan", un estudiante universitario, acaba quedándose en casa de sus amigos de la infancia, las mellizos Rikka y Futaba.
Los tres eran "buenos amigos", pero, ¿el amor de los mellizos por el guapo y maduro Tatchan parece haberse descontrolado...?
Una comedia romántica ligeramente erótica y emocionante ♡

altTitles.th: เชิญร่ำสุรา

description.en: The Six Prefectures of Zhongbo were ceded away in surrender to the external enemies, and Shen Zechuan was taken into custody in the capital, reduced to a drowning dog loathed and condemned by all. Xiao Chiye followed the scent of the furor and made his way over. But instead of setting others on him, he kicked Shen Zechuan with his very own leg that rendered the latter an invalid. Who would expect this invalid to turn around and bite him in a counterattack until he was all drenched in blood? That was the start of an epic feud between both men who tear at each other every time they come face-to-face with one another.
description.pl:
Shen Zechuan jest ósmym synem zdradzieckiego księcia Jianxing, człowieka, który skazał swoje miasta i ludzi na zagładę z rąk wroga. Jako jedyny żyjący członek swojej linii, Shen Zechuan jest znienawidzony przez cały naród. A nienawiść nikogo nie płonie goręcej niż uczucie Xiao Chiye, najmłodszego syna potężnego księcia Libei.

Xiao Chiye niczego nie pragnie bardziej niż śmierci Shen Zechuana, ale ten wbrew wszelkim przeciwnościom trzyma się życia. Zamiast poddać się hańbie swojej rodziny, staje się cierniem w boku Xiao Chiye, wdzierając się do bezwzględnego świata politycznego stolicy. Jednak gdy ci dwaj zaciekli wrogowie walczą z więzami swojego losu, zostają przyciągnięci do siebie siłą, której żaden z nich się nie spodziewa — i żaden z nich nie może mieć nadziei, że się jej oprze.

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en:
The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun receives a letter… from himself? It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

altTitles.ja: 悪役が施す美徳

description.en:
Ginger Torte and Lerajie Atlanta, both noble daughters of marquesses, are lifelong enemies and rivals. When Ginger's fiancé, Kishon Mickelson, is stolen by Lerajie, Ginger decides she's had enough!

But one day, Ginger stumbles upon a strange novel - one where Lerajie is the main protagonist, and she is the villainess! She tries her best to ignore it, but when things start playing out just as written in the story, she has no choice but to rely on the novel to change her doomed future as the villainess.

"Exactly what did I do to deserve this fate?! Why did I have to become the villainess?"
 
Enter the mysterious Prince Izana, the male lead of the novel. Confined within the depths of the Templar Tower for years by King Astor, he finally sees the light of day when his father passes away. But according to the novel, he's destined to fall in love with Lerajie, leaving Ginger to wallow in her own misery!
  
"All I ever did was live life as best I could! But as if stealing my fiancé wasn’t enough, now Lerajie is going to claim the male lead?! No way I'll let that happen!"

The "villainess" Ginger, who now knows Prince Izana’s deepest secret (thanks to the novel), attempts to seduce him with -2% cautiousness and 200% cuteness!

---
For hopeless romantic Ginger Torte, getting engaged to the man of her dreams is a fairy tale come true. It isn’t long before she realizes the gut-wrenching truth — her fiancé has been seduced by her rival! The heartbroken Ginger finds solace in a new book that recounts the tale of a young woman and a cursed prince… But to her horror, the protagonist turns out to be none other than her beautiful nemesis, Lerazie! As reality unfolds according to the book, both ladies fall in love with the handsome prince at first sight. Ginger vows to steal both the spotlight and the prince’s heart! But, does this story harbor a sinister secret?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD%EC%9D%B4-%EB%B2%A0%ED%91%B8%EB%8A%94-%EB%AF%B8%EB%8D%95/2369), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=54363470)

description.fr:
Fille de marquis, elle est belle et a un fiancé qu’elle chérit. Mais lorsque son ennemie de toujours lui vole son homme, une véritable guerre commence. En plus, elle tombe sur un livre qui reprend sa vie et où... elle tient le rôle de la méchante! Quand les choses se déroulent comme indiqué dans l'histoire, elle n'a pas d'autre choix que de s'appuyer sur le roman, si elle veut échapper à un destin peu glorieux.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD%EC%9D%B4-%EB%B2%A0%ED%91%B8%EB%8A%94-%EB%AF%B8%EB%8D%95/2369), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=54363470)

description.ko:
열심히 살았을 뿐인데 라이벌에게 약혼자를 빼앗기고,
첫눈에 반한 남자마저 라이벌과 사랑에 빠지고….
나보다 쟤가 나은 게 대체 뭐야?

괴로워하던 ‘진저 토르테’ 손에 들어온 소설책 한 권.
라이벌 ‘레라지에’와 진저의 이야기가 그대로 쓰여 있는 수상한 소설책에서,
레라지에가 주인공이고 진저 토르테가 악녀…?
열심히 살았을 뿐인데 악녀라니… 악녀라니!!!
게다가 라이벌이 잘나간 건 모두 주인공 버프 덕분이었다고?

“레라지에, 네가 주인공이라고?
좋아, 그렇다면 네게 악역이 베푸는 미덕을 보여 주지.
남자 주인공은 내가 손에 넣어 주겠어!”

---

description.ru:
У неё была и так нелёгкая жизнь, но однажды она потеряла своего жениха из-за соперницы, в которую тот влюбился с первого взгляда, но чем она хуже неё? Неожиданно в руки Джинджер попадается странный роман. В этом романе рассказывается история соперничества Лераджии и Джинджер, где Лераджия является главной героиней, а Джинджер оказывается злодейкой. «Мне просто не везло по жизни, но я не злодейка! Хорошо, Лераджия, раз ты главная героиня, то я покажу всем достоинство злодеев! И я обязательно сделаю так, что один из главных персонажей влюбится в меня!»

---

description.uk:
«Все, що я коли-небудь робила, це проживала своє життя як могла, але мого нареченого вкрала моя суперниця, і чоловік, в якого я закохалася з першого погляду, теж її любить… Боже, що в ній такого прекрасного, саме ?” Роман потрапляє в руки змученої Джинджер Торт. У цьому дивному романі, який обертається навколо Джинджер та її суперниці Лераджі, Лераджі є головною героїнею, а Джинджер — лиходійкою…? «Все, що я коли-небудь робила, це важко працювала у житті... але лиходійка? Лиходійка?! І єдина причина, чому все пішло так добре для Лераджі, була лише тому, що вона була головною героїнею!» «Лераджі, ти головний герой?» Добре, тоді, як лиходійка, я покажу тобі, які чесноти я можу тобі подарувати. Я вкраду головного героя і зроблю його своїм чоловіком! Джинджер, яка тепер знає таємницю наслідного принца Ізани через роман, намагається вкрасти його у Лераджі...!

---
Джинджер Торте і Лераджія Атланта - шляхетні дочки маркізів, суперниці навіки. Коли Лераджія зваблює нареченого Джинджер, та вирішує, що з неї досить!
Але одного разу до рук Джинджер потрапляє дивний роман, у якому Лераджія головна героїня, а вона - лиходійка! Джинджер намагається забути про прочитане, але коли сюжет книги починає справджуватись, у неї не залишається вибору... Покладаючись на роман, Джинджер змінить свою долю лиходійки!

title.en: Tensura Nikki: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken

altTitles.en: The Slime Diaries: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensura Nikki Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken

altTitles.ja: 転スラ日記 転生したらスライムだった件

description.en:
This Spinoff Manga has content based starting from Volume 3 of the Light Novel.

"Dear diary… I got reincarnated as a slime."

Even in another world, lives aren't always on the line. There's plenty of work to be done, from feeding the community and forging the items the community needs; as well as plenty of play ...and hijinks throughout! Join Rimuru and friends as they kick back and enjoy their daily lives.
___
**Character Designer:** [Mitz Vah](https://mangadex.org/author/63e87d1a-11f9-4c5f-9a7f-d7687a923366)
description.it: Questa è la serie spin-off ufficiale 4-koma di "Vita da slime"! A differenza della storia principale, questa vede la vita quotidiana di Limur da una nuova prospettiva!
description.es-la:
Este Manga Spinoff tiene contenido basado de los Volumenes 3,4, y 5 de la Novela Ligera.

"Querido diario... me reencarne como un slime."

Incluso en otro mundo, las vidas no siempre estan en la linea. Hay mucho trabajo que hacer, desde alimentar a la comunidad y forjar los items que necesitan; como tambien hay un monton de juego... ¡Y travesuras!. Unete a Rimuru y sus amigos mientras que se relajan y disfrutan de sus vidas diarias.

altTitles.en: There Are No Red Flowers for Ten Days

altTitles.es-la: Venganza de la Flor de Ciruelo

description.en:
The scripture that brought a bloodstorm to Jianghu was the "Wisdom of the Secret Master," a legendary book that is said to hold the power to seize all the world's authority and wealth. Because of it, Woonseon lost all his loved ones overnight. 
Now, he casts aside his bright and pure past and embarks on a desperate journey for revenge. The flower will wither in ten days. Nothing in this world will be eternal, whether it's wealth, power, or love.

title.en: Can't Stand This Earth for Just Another Moment!

altTitles.zh: 这个地球一刻也待不下去了！！

description.en: Hannah, once a pious bear angel, was unlucky enough to be sent to Earth by after being tested by God and was to live the life of a middle school student for three years. In this period, what kind of hilarious antics will she come up with in her day-to-day life with her idiotic classmates?

title.en: The Story of How The Horned Owl I Rescued Turned Into a Girl

altTitles.ja: 保護したミミズクが女の子になっちゃった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Hogo Shita Mimizuku ga Onnanoko ni Nacchatta Hanashi

description.en: One day, a kind-hearted young man finds an injured owl and decides to take it in, caring for it until it recovers. However, to his surprise, the owl mysteriously transforms into a young girl overnight. The girl, who has the appearance and behavior of the owl, struggles to adapt to her new human form while the protagonist tries to understand the strange circumstances behind her transformation. As they navigate the challenges of this unexpected change, they form a unique bond, uncovering magical secrets and slowly developing feelings for each other. But with the transformation still unresolved, they must find out what it means and whether the owl-girl can return to her true form—or if she even wants to.
description.id: Seekor burung hantu bertanduk yang berubah menjadi seorang gadis loli.
